title: Best of The Program | Guest: Jason Whitlock | 7/26/21
description:
Pat Gray joins to discuss his vacation, the possible return of mask mandates, and the ongoing employee shortage. The Cleveland Indians are changing their name, but they should have checked the website first. BlazeTV host Jason Whitlock calls in to discuss how the NFL’s new COVID-19 restrictions are “medical Jim Crow” and why vaccine skepticism is high among African Americans.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
